cz.syntea.xdef.xml

Class KDOMUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.xml.KDOMUtils
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KXmlUtils

    public class KDOMUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of static methods extending methods from org.w3c.dom interfaces.

        Set necessary xmlns attributes to this element and all child elements.
        Parameters:

      • cloneWithChangedNamespace

        public static final org.w3c.dom.Element cloneWithChangedNamespace(org.w3c.dom.Element elem,
                                                                  java.lang.String oldns,
                                                                  java.lang.String newns)
        Return clone of an element and all attributes and child nodes with changed given NameSpace URI to the new value.
        Parameters:
        elem - source element.
        oldns - old NameSpace URI (may be null, NOT an empty string!).
        newns - new NameSpace (may be null, NOT an empty string!).
        Returns:
        clone of element with changed NameSpace.

      • getTextContent

        public static final java.lang.String getTextContent(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Get text concatenated from all child nodes (see org.w3c.dom.Node.getTesxtcontent() DOM Level 3).
        Parameters:
        node - node from which text content is collected.
        Returns:
        String with text concatenated from all child nodes or the empty string.

      • getTextNodes

        public static final org.w3c.dom.NodeList getTextNodes(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                                      boolean coalesce)
        Get text nodes from all textual child nodes of node from argument. As textual nodes are considered nodes of type:
        • org.w3c.dom.CDATASection
        • org.w3c.dom.Text
        • org.w3c.dom.EntityReference
        Parameters:
        node - actual node; it's children are inspected.
        coalesce - if true text nodes are coalesced.
        Returns:
        NodeList with text nodes.

      • getTextNodesCoalesced

        public static final org.w3c.dom.NodeList getTextNodesCoalesced(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Get coalesced text nodes from all textual child nodes of a node. As textual nodes are considered nodes of type:
        • org.w3c.dom.CDATASection
        • org.w3c.dom.Text
        • org.w3c.dom.EntityReference
        All node items in the returned NodeList object are created as new Text nodes, i.e. consequently their parents are null.
        Parameters:
        node - it's children are inspected.
        Returns:
        NodeList with text nodes.

      • getTextValue

        public static final java.lang.String getTextValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Get text concatenated from all direct child nodes.
        Parameters:
        node - actual node; it's children are inspected.
        Returns:
        String with text value or null.

      • getBoundElement

        public static final org.w3c.dom.Element getBoundElement(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
        Return element bound to a node. If the argument is an Element then it is returned. If it is a Document then document element is returned. If it is an Attribute, then owner element is returned. Otherwise if the parent node is an element it is returned. If no it is no one of above cases null is returned.
        Parameters:
        node - node which bound element is returned.
        Returns:
        bound element or null.

      • getNSURI

        public static final java.lang.String getNSURI(java.lang.String prefix,
                                              org.w3c.dom.Element elem)
        Return NameSpace URI of prefix in context of given element.
        Parameters:
        prefix - prefix of NameSpace or null.
        elem - element in which context an URI is searched.
        Returns:
        URI or empty string.

      • createNodeCopyInDocument

        public static final org.w3c.dom.Node createNodeCopyInDocument(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                              org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                                              boolean deep)
                                                       throws SRuntimeException
        Create copy of node in given Document. This method is similar to org.w3c.dom.Node.cloneNode(deep). However, if document of given node is not equal to document from argument doc then the new copy of node is created in the document from argument.
        Parameters:
        doc - document where clone of node is created.
        node - object which to be cloned/copied.
        deep - if true child nodes are created, otherwise ignored.
        Returns:
        copy of node from argument created in given document.
        Throws:
        SRuntimeException - XML201 if an error occurs.

      • resolveXPosition

        public static final org.w3c.dom.Node resolveXPosition(org.w3c.dom.Node n,
                                                      java.lang.String xpos)
        Resolve relative position in given node. Note that the position is NOT full XPath expression. XPosition may contain only an abbreviated location path with single "/" selectors and with index specifiers "[n]" where n is an integer and the last step may point only to an attribute ("@name") or to a text node ("text()[n]") or element node (name[n]).
        Parameters:
        n - a node.
        xpos - XPosition.
        Returns:
        the node or null.

      • resolveXPosition

        public static final org.w3c.dom.Node resolveXPosition(org.w3c.dom.Node n,
                                                      java.lang.String xpos,
                                                      javax.xml.namespace.NamespaceContext context)
        Resolve relative position in given node. Note that the position is NOT full XPath expression. XPosition may contain only an abbreviated location path with single "/" selectors and with index specifiers "[n]" where n is an integer and the last step may point only to an attribute ("@name") or to a text node ("text()[n]") or element node (name[n]).
        Parameters:
        n - a node.
        xpos - XPath position.
        context - namespaceContext
        Returns:
        the node or null.

      • getXPosition

        public static final java.lang.String getXPosition(org.w3c.dom.Node n)
        Get string with xpath position of a node. The result position is NOT the full XPath expression. Generated position cotains the abbreviated location path with single "/" selectors and with index specifiers "[n]" where n is index of a child node. If the argument is an attribute then the last step is "@name", if it is a text node thle last step is "text()[n]" and if it is an element node than ths last location step is the name of element followed with the childnode index [n].
        Parameters:
        n - node of which xpath position is to be created.
        Returns:
        string with the XPath position.
